<Marc-Amable Girard
1:
--------------------
Text: Marc-Amable Girard:  The "Canadian Parliamentary Guide" lists Girard as having been Premier (or "Chief Minister") from 1871 to 1872, but he did not have this title at the time and was not the government leader.

Triplets:<Marc-Amable Girard
3:
--------------------
Text: Marc-Amable Girard:  In this sense, he may be regarded as the first Premier of Manitoba.

Triplets:<Marc-Amable Girard
